case.state: Strip poker, huh? A bit vanilla for my tastes, but I'm willing to see where this goes.

Oh great. A fairy. Hopefully she isn't as air-headed as a certain other fairy I know.
I've never seen a sheep-girl who looks more sheep than girl before.
Oh great. a "Goddess" is playing with us.
Nobody told me there would be angels here.
I-is t-that a g-ghost?!
No. We can't both be Alice. Restart and pick a different name. It's been in my family for 16 generations, tracing back to Alice I, the dark god herself. So I think I get dibs on it.
You would pick me. Pervert.
Luka, what are you doing here? Hora- Nothing perverted, right?
You... you want me to call you pervert? Kind of takes the fun out of it...
I've come to learn more about human cultures. If our races are going to coexist, we need to understand each other.
I'm here to learn more about human culture. And if I happen to get some semen, well that's icing on the cake!

~cards~.
Give me ~cards~.
I need ~cards~.
Hmm... ~cards~?
~cards~. And make them good ones.
~cards~. Give me good ones this time.
I'll take ~cards~. All aces if you will.
Ugh how to salvage this... Give me ~cards~ I guess.
Give me one. And It better be a spade.
Give me one. And It better be a heart.
5. Just give me a whole new hand. One that doesn't suck.

Looks like my luck is finally turning around!
What a great way to start!
What a powerful first hand!
Great first hand!

Gr... What is the point of a man who has no semen?
I may not look like it right now, but I am a monster girl.

Wish this was the type of poker that I could raise in.
This hand is better than an Ama-ama Dango! ...Well almost.
Not bad at all.
I'm safe. For sure.
If this were blackjack I would totally be doubling down.
If the dealer were a monster girl, I would make her a duchess for giving me this.

Even Ilias couldn't beat this hand!
Looks like my luck is finally turning around!
I knew I was more powerful in this form. I didn't know I was luckier too!
This hand is better than an Ama-ama Dango!

These cards should keep me in the game.
Not violating myself this round!
If the dealer were a monster girl, I would make her a duchess for giving me these cards.

Looks like I shall be feasting this game.

I was told there would be semen here, But I can see now that was a lie.

Why are you giving me that look, ~player~? I did tell you that I am a monster girl, didn't I?

Could be better. Could be worse.
Could go either way.
sigh... It'll have to do.
Whatever. Someone else probably has something worse.
Well it isn't good, but one of you is bound to have messed up more than me.
Meh. Just meh.
A pair is usually good enough, right?
At least it isn't nothing.
Could be worse... not much though.
Not what I was hoping for. Not terrible either.
That's a bad way to start.
Really? Garbage on the first hand?
Not exactly how I wanted this match to start...
Howexactly am I supposed to get semen from an all girl table?
I was told there would be semen here, But I can see now that was a lie.
Gr... What is the point of a man who has no semen?
I may not look like it right now but I am a monster girl.
You should all feel honored. You're playing with the monster lord.
Why are you giving me that look, ~player~? I did tell you that I am a monster girl, didn't I?
What are you staring at, ~player~? Haven't you seen a lamia before?
Did Ilias shuffle these cards?!
Can we re-deal? This dealer is an idiot.
I want a re-deal.
The monster lord deserves a better hand than this.
I think my hand is worse than before I traded.
Blech. This hand is straight from heaven.
This hand is worse than angel liver. Blech.
Are we sure this dealer isn't a kitsune in disguise?
This hand blows. And not in the good way.
Are you kidding me? This is awful.
My hand is utter garbage, but I bet one of you idiots still somehow manages to lose.
I really need to stop chasing these straights...
Two bad hands in a row?! If I lose this one, I can't guarantee the dealer is going to make it out of here alive.
Two bad hands in a row?! If I lose this one, we might need a new dealer.
I might be done for. This really is my last layer...
This doesn't look good... I wish I had another ribbon somewhere.
No more hidden ribbons, so this might be it.
I demand a re deal.
I deserve a better hand than this.
Yuck. This hand is straight from heaven.
This hand is worse than angel liver. Gross.
Miss Margatroid? Never heard of her.
Hey, we match now!
Crowned... Prince? Shouldn't it be Princess? Just when I think I understand something about human culture, I get proven wrong again.
Wait... Prince? Shouldn't it be Princess? Why do you humans have such confusing rules and title for your leaders?
Consort? Oh, she's not a ghost then. She must be some kind of ghost monster girl. Nothing scary about that.
She's your consort? Ooh, I get it. She can't be a ghost then. She's some kind of ghost monster girl. Nothing to be afraid of.
"World Traveler!" It's the ultimate guide for any adventurer or gourmet! I found it in the library and brought it with me when I traveled the human lands. It is a few centuries out of date though...
I don't really get to be choosey. In my family, we are only allowed to marry a man who is stronger than us. That'll be a once in a lifetime opportunity, if it even happens at all.
So excited to strip that you forgot to introduce yourself? I like that.
Normally I'd make fun of you for being an airhead, but I'll forgive you since you took off your shirt first.
I recently attacked a "Goddess." I left a mark too. You should have seen the indignant look she gave me!
Believe me, if fapping is done at anyone here's expense, it's mine.
What? I'm royalty and I didn't pull a stunt like this!
Yes actually. If the monster lord didn't need to hide behind some plants, then neither did the princess of coward-ville.
This is pure cowardice.
I can't believe that this is allowed!
You have got to be kidding me!
Favorite food? Happiness Village Honey! No wait, Ama-ama Dangoes!
Thanks, Navi. They're actually a part of my body. I can do... "interesting" things with them.
Monster girls don't have princesses. My position as Monster lord was hard earned.
Interesting. I didn't know that regular humans had power like that. I thought only humans with monster or angel ancestors could be powerful.
Normal humans can have power like that? I thought it was just humans descended from monsters or angels who had that kind of power.
So that's how you keep floating. I've never met a human who could fly before. Most humans are far too weak and pathetic for such a thing.
Huh. I didn't know humans could fly. I thought they were too pathetic for that kind of magic.
Quirks? I can fly too, but I wouldn't really call it a quirk. It's just something you can do when you are as powerful as me.
What is with all the fake heroes in this dump? Are we next to a hypocrite convention? A temple to stupidity?
3 Ilias-damned heroes? Is this a set up? Try anything and I'll show you how small your brains really are.
Ugh... a "hero." I know your type.
Not another "hero"...
A "hero"? Don't try anything funny. Unless you want to die, that is.
Ah... all the semen I could want.

state.text: Looks like I shall be feasting this game.
It's my lucky day. A buffet of men to chose from.

case.state: It's down to you and me. Time to start taking this seriously.
Just the two of us left. You have no hope.
No one else left to hide behind. Just you and me.
I always preferred one-on-ones. It's much more... intimate.
Just us two left. This doesn't end well for you.
What are you talking about, Jura? I won my title fairly. In a free-for-all battle with all others who sought it.
Jura, you have no idea what you are talking about. If you think you would make a better monster lord you are welcome to fight me for the title.
I won my title in a free-for-all battle with the four most powerful monster girls in the world, Revy. You can shit talk about it when you've done the same.
Yes Revy, I am the monster lord. It means that I'm the ruler of all monster girls. Keep that in mind if you intend to keep insulting me.
I'll let that transgression slide since you seem to be ignorant, Revy. I am queen of the monster girls. I have subordinates, who have subordinates that eat chumps like you for breakfast. Literally.
I only eat men who anger me Jura. Don't go around spreading rumors like that. Human-monster girl relations are already very strained.
It's not like I'm a spider girl who eats men for the fun of it. I only eat men who deserve it.
Huh, men think you want to eat them? Well, If you ever figure out how to convince them otherwise, let me know. That would be... useful for me.
I'm here to learn about humans. And if I can snag some free semen, that's a bonus.
How am I in bed? Let's just say I'm to die for.
I am most definitely a top.
Monster girls trace their lineage through their mother's side. My dad was just some guy I never met. Normal for my family.
I would prefer a fight. I would easily win, then I would get to claim the spoils.
He wants to... what?! That's fucked up. And it takes a lot for me to say that. I eat people.
A... horse? Are you sure you don't mean a centaur? That would make slightly more sense.
Could I fight them all then suck them all? That's usually how I prefer to do things.
Absolutely not. What kind of pervert do yo take me for? Although I hear Ilias is into that kind of thing.

state.text: Well it would definitely involve holding ~player~ down and having my way with them. Forcefully.

case.state: I'm not falling for that. What kind of idiot do you take me for?
That's wrong! Everyone knows that line quality is far more important than count!
The moth-girl of course. They are adorable.
Bend over and I'll show you.
Have you ever seen a snake sweat before? I'm usually... a lot scalier.
No strong preferences. I prefer scales to hair to be honest.
I have a couple. I'll have to show you after the game.
I like to tease ~player~ when they strip. Does that count?
I've thought about bringing Granberia with me. It would be funny to see her squirm.
Absolutely not. Do I look like a furry to you?
I'm not sure which hotel you mean, but I've been staying at human hotels recently.
Are you doubting me Meia? I earned my title fair and square. I defeated all others who sought the title in a free-for-all battle. How else would one become a ruler?
Looks are deceiving. I assure you that I'm the most dangerous monster you have ever seen.
I am nobody's disciple. Especially not a puppeteers!
The feeling is mutual angel-boy.
Interesting? I think you mean sexy. It's for attracting... prey.
I'll have you know I only eat men who deserve it. I'm trying to build a world where humans and monster girls can coexist peacefully. It's bad PR if I just go around eating people.
You think your people get a bad rap, Meia? Humans killed my mother because their precious "Goddess" brainwashed them into thinking monsters are evil. She didn't even eat people!
Huh, men think you want to eat them? Well, If you ever figure out how to convince them otherwise, I'd be interested to know how you did it. That would be... useful for me.
The feeling is mutual, angel-boy.
I can't complain. That was one hell of a winning streak!
I was sure I would win with that flush...
I lost with a straight?!
So much for my three of a kind.
Not very often that you lose with two pair.
I suppose my streak had to end eventually.
My winning streak was fun while it lasted.
Can't complain this time. That was a hell of a winning streak.
Two losses in a row, and I'm still in the lead? That's just sad.
Don't get used to this. You are all just lucky idiots.
I'm actually kind of glad I lost this one.
Its kind of a win-win. I'm not used to wearing boots anyways.
Good, lets get these boots off.
I thought I'd be nice and let you guys win one.
I suppose I couldn't keep winning forever.
It doesn't matter. I could afford to lose this one.
You win some, you lose some.
I did my best, Some hands just can't be won.
My turn to strip. Jeez, ~player~, you can stop drooling.

About to lose my panties and somehow I'm in the lead. You're all pretty bad at this game.

My turn to take off my top. Monster girls do this all the time, so I'm not embarrassed.
My turn, right? I guess I'll take my top off next. It's not a big deal where I come from. Many monster girls don't wear clothes at all.

Fine. I guess it's pick on Alice day.

Think again. I have one thing left to remove.
Not quite. I still have something to remove.
I don't know how you humans wear these things all the time. I'll be glad to have them off.
I can't take these things off fast enough. Why you humans wear them all the time is a mystery to me.
